org.piccolo2d.extras.util

Class PBoundsLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.piccolo2d.extras.util.PLocator
      • org.piccolo2d.extras.util.PNodeLocator
        • org.piccolo2d.extras.util.PBoundsLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PBoundsLocator
extends PNodeLocator
    PBoundsLocator is a locator that locates points on the bounds of a node.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jesse Grosjean
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
